section.title: GLFWimage Struct Reference
Detailed Description
section.para: This describes a single 2D image. See the documentation for each related function what the expected pixel format is.

formalpara.title: Since
formalpara.para: Added in version 2.1. @glfw3 Removed format and bytes-per-pixel members.

section.section:
Member Data Documentation
height heightGLFWimage GLFWimageheight
int GLFWimage::height
The height, in pixels, of this image.
pixels pixelsGLFWimage GLFWimagepixels
unsigned char * GLFWimage::pixels
The pixel data of this image, arranged left-to-right, top-to-bottom.
width widthGLFWimage GLFWimagewidth
int GLFWimage::width
The width, in pixels, of this image.
